title: The boiling river of the Amazon
description: When Andrés Ruzo was a young boy in Peru, his grandfather told him a story with an odd detail: There is a river, deep in the Amazon, which boils as if a fire burns below it. Twelve years later, after training as a geoscientist, he set out on a journey deep into the jungle of South America in search of this boiling river. At a time when everything seems mapped and measured, join Ruzo as he explores a river that forces us to question the line between known and unknown ... and reminds us that there are great wonders yet to be discovered.
author: Andrés Ruzo
keywords: TED, talks, adventure, beauty, bioethics, chemistry, environment, exploration, South America, geology, motivation, nature, science, ecology, rivers, indigenous peoples
